entry.title: The Last Amber Sign: The Price of Survival
entry.summary:
Author: am0ra

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,089Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 7

Summary: In the whispers of the resistance, they say the Linaje are immortal. That the Argents are invincible.But Derek Hale has seen his family‚Äôs blood spilled, and the truth is something else.Now, he leads a group of rebels on desperate missions, challenging the shadows that rule the world. But everything changes when an encounter with a stranger ‚Äî a man who carries secrets more dangerous than death itself ‚Äî puts at risk something far more dangerous than an end: the chance to change the future.In a game where even magic costs more than any life, Derek will have to decide how far he‚Äôs willing to go to destroy the Argent regime... and how much he‚Äôs willing to sacrifice to save himself and humanity.

entry.title: The Alpha's List
entry.summary:
Author: Vampire_Finch

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 71,635Chapters: 26/26Kudos: 361

Summary: In the Game of Love, he Made the Rules. The Honorable Derek Hale, Marquis of Redbridge.He is aristocratic, excessively handsome, excessively wealthy, aloof, reserved, arrogant and the powerful Alpha of one of the most renowned packs in the country. He has been an elusive prize for years, the target of desperate society Omega and their matchmaking mothers. But he is not swayed by flirtatious smiles and fine looks, social climbers and fortune hunters. He wants more.When his lack of an Omega causes concern to his mother, uncle and pack a remedy is suggested in the form of a suitable match. Derek draws up a list of qualifications and attributes for his future mate. Can any Omega hope to win the heart of such a demanding bachelor and cynic?Stiles Stilinski the Omega son of a clergyman can only try his best. The Marquis is not sure whether he has discovered the perfect Omega‚Ä¶ Or the been the victim of a cruel hoax.

entry.title: Morning Dew
entry.summary:
Author: Samandiriel (kyra516)

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 35,739Chapters: 8/10Kudos: 203

Summary: Stiles had always been a bit of an odd bunny compared to his peers. He had this sense of adventure and the need to explore! His father said he got most of it from his late mother. His father also called it recklessness and lack of self-preservation. Most of the time, Stiles just dismissed his father as being plain wrong.Today however? Today he reckoned his father was completely and truly right in his judgement. Because today, Stiles had made the most reckless and stupid decision of his life. You see, Stiles had the brilliant idea of venturing into wolf lands to do some gathering, and so here he was, on the other side of the river, in the unknown lands that no bunny before him had dared to venture into. What could possibly go wrong?It was all Jackson's fault anyway.
